Event.name: Receive_visitor_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>A (potential) <fen>Visitor</fen> arrives at a location associated with a (potential) <fen>Host</fen>. The <fen>Host</fen> permits the <fen>Visitor</fen> to enter the location, and allows the <fen>Visitor</fen> to avail him/herself of available resources, in order to pursue some goal. The visit is often for social or entertainment reasons. After a temporary stay at the <fen>Host</fen>'s location, the <fen>Visitor</fen> departs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Host
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Host</fen> allows the Visitor to remain with him/her to acheive a goal.</def-root>

Arg.name: Visitor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Visitor temporarily remains with the <fen>Host</fen> in order to achieve his/her purpose.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The goal of the <fen>Host</fen> in allowing the <fen>Visitor</fen> to enter the <fen>Host</fen>'s location.</def-root>
